scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ADMIN_ENV=development vue-cli-service serve --mode development
scripts.dev:release: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ADMIN_ENV=release vue-cli-service serve --mode release
scripts.dev:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ADMIN_ENV=production vue-cli-service serve --mode production
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ADMIN_ENV=development vue-cli-service build --mode development
scripts.build:release: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ADMIN_ENV=release vue-cli-service build --mode release
scripts.build:production: cross-env NODE_ENV=production ADMIN_ENV=production vue-cli-service build --mode production
